DOC.brief_summary: The purpose step wedge randomize control trial evaluate effectiveness crowdsourced intervention promote HIV test among young Chinese men sex men ( MSM ) . The crowdsourced intervention include open contest , judge determine finalist prize , designathon , contest-based MSM engagement . The hypothesis crowdsourced intervention superior conventional HIV test uptake campaign elicit HIV test uptake .
DOC.detailed_description: This study use adaptation step wedge randomize controlled trial design . A total eight major metropolitan city implement crowdsourced intervention . These city choose base follow criterion : 1 ) previous CDC MSM sentinel surveillance site ; 2 ) capacity campaign implementation ; 3 ) capacity intervention implementation community level . Four city implement intensive in-person event promote engagement ( Guangzhou , Shenzhen Guangdong Province , Qingdao , Jinan Shandong Province ) survey intervention stage . The RCT evaluate use two different source data : 1 ) online survey data MSM eight city prior intervention ; 2 ) CDC routine surveillance data eight city prior intervention .
DOC.criteria: Currently live plan live one eight city use study next 12 month . Not live HIV No HIV test past three month Born biologically male identify either male transgender female Had anal oral sex men least lifetime 16 year old Willing provide cell phone number Complete inform consent document Women exclude study
